DOC.brief_summary: This small-scale study effect microbes human gut add high-fiber snack food usual diet . The snack food provide Mondelez International , Inc . Eight pair dizygotic twin , discordant concordant obesity , participate study . They complete 3 successive experiment regular diet supplement consumption , 6-week period , high-fiber snack food . Each experiment involve ( ) two week consume regular diet ( fecal sample collect weekly ) ; ( ii ) one week consume one snack food per day ( approximately 7 g fiber , collection fecal sample ) , ( iii ) one week consume two snack food per day ( approximately 14 g fiber , collection fecal sample ) , ( iv ) four week consume three snack food per day ( approximately 20 g fiber , collection fecal sample ) ; ( v ) two week consume regular diet ( weekly collection fecal sample ) . For experiment , participant also provide fast blood sample free diet phase end week initiation snack consumption , fast blood sample end last week snack consumption . Participants also collect one first morning urine sample weekly throughout study . During week 2 , participant also collect first morning urine sample 3 consecutive day . Similarly , collect first morning urine sample last 3 consecutive day last week snack consumption . The study test effect different fiber-rich snack composition metabolic property gut microbial community lean obese subject .
DOC.criteria: member female dizygotic twin pair discordant concordant obesity ( 1 ) Pregnant try get pregnant ; ( 2 ) inflammatory bowel disease ; ( 3 ) gastrointestinal cancer ; ( 4 ) hepatitis ; ( 5 ) HIV ; ( 6 ) renal failure ; ( 7 ) food allergy .
